whyUs.title: Why Better Together?
whyUs.description: Are you looking for a unique wedding that fits you perfectly and is simply fun? Do you want a relaxed house set for your garden party? Or dance until the early morning hours to your favorite songs, across the hits of the last decades? Or let nothing but hip hop come out of the speakers? For that, you need people who not only understand music, but also sensitively respond to your needs. Hand in hand with you, we give everything to make your wedding an unforgettable experience - exactly as you imagine it. We ensure a suitable music selection that gets you and your guests storming the dance floor. The right music at the right time. Together we create your legendary party!

whatWeOffer.title: What We Offer
whatWeOffer.description: With us as your wedding DJ in and around Berlin, you get the complete worry-free package: In an initial meeting, we coordinate the style of your party and your musical preferences and no-gos. On your wedding day, we come with everything needed for a successful party: DJ equipment, appropriate audio and lighting technology - and of course with the best mood üíÉüï∫

I saw Jonathan play among other DJ's at a company event and his set was definitely my favourite one! He knows how to fit the mood: sometimes he plays the crowd-pleasers, but also more of niche-tracks which makes you want to think "ooooh what is this song, I must save it!".
